---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Crear un government check request"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/government_check_requests"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Crea un nuevo government check request para verificar datos de identidad contra el registro civil.
Se debe proporcionar `subject_id` o `user_reference` (mutuamente exclusivos).


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["nin","document_number"],"properties":{"nin":{"type":"string","description":"RUT del titular (formato chileno).","example":"12345678-9"},"document_number":{"type":"string","description":"Número de documento de identidad.","example":"123456789"},"subject_id":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Token del sujeto existente (Identity o Entity). Mutuamente exclusivo con `user_reference`.","example":"ent_5F6Q6C2EwkXtkEpB1TlGjk"},"user_reference":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Referencia de usuario de tu sistema. Mutuamente exclusivo con `subject_id`.","example":"user_123"}},"title":"GovernmentCheckRequestInput"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Government check request creado exitosamente","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"government_check_request":{"x-tags":["Government check requests"],"type":"object","description":"Los government check requests representan solicitudes de verificación de identidad contra el registro civil,\nsin necesidad de biometría.\n","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Identificador único del government check request.","example":"govcheck_1B2M2Y8AsgTpgAmY7PhCfg"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["pending","validating","successful","failed"],"description":"Estado actual del government check request."},"subject_id":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Identificador del sujeto asociado (Identity o Entity).","example":"ent_5F6Q6C2EwkXtkEpB1TlGjk"},"user_reference":{"type":"string","description":"Referencia de usuario de tu sistema.","example":"user_123"},"validation_errors":{"type":"array","description":"Errores de validación (solo presente cuando el estado es `failed`).\n\nCódigos posibles:\n- `auth-074` / `invalid_document_number`: Número de documento inválido.\n- `auth-075` / `government_api_error`: La base de datos gubernamental no estaba disponible al momento de la consulta.\n- `auth-076` / `document_not_valid`: El documento no se encuentra vigente.\n","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string","description":"Código de error.","enum":["auth-074","auth-075","auth-076"],"example":"auth-074"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"Tipo de error.","enum":["document"],"example":"document"},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Identificador del error.","enum":["document_not_valid","invalid_document_number","government_api_error"],"example":"document_not_valid"},"detail":{"type":"string","description":"Mensaje legible del error.","example":"Número de documento inválido."}}}},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Fecha y hora de creación del government check request."}},"title":"GovernmentCheckRequest"}}}}}},"401":{"description":"Error de autenticación","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["type","title","status","detail"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","example":"authentication_error"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"Unauthorized"},"status":{"type":"integer","example":401},"detail":{"type":"string","example":"We could not authenticate your credentials. Please check the documentation at https://docs.soyio.id"}}}}}},"422":{"description":"Error de validación","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["type","title","status","errors"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","example":"validation_error"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"Validation error"},"status":{"type":"integer","example":422},"errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"ValidationError"},{"type":"object","properties":{"errors":{"example":["Either subject_id or user_reference is required","nin is required","document_number is required","nin has an invalid format. Must be a valid Chilean RUT"]}}}]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
